value:
Gain a Hero as your ally by
summoning them.

Select which allies you will send
into battle via Edit Teams in the
Allies menu.
Collect a Gift from the Present List

Various gifts will arrive in your
Present List each day.
Clear Prologue: Part 1 in Story Maps

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Raise an ally's level under Allies,
Ally Growth, and then Level Up.

First, try leveling up Reinhardt.
Clear Book I, Chapter 1-1 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.
Clear Book I, Chapter 1-3 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.
Summon a Hero with Heroic Grails

Summon a Hero of your choosing
using Heroic Grails.

First, try summoning Rinea.
Clear Book I, Chapter 1-5 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Learn about the weapon triangle
in the Red, Blue, and Green map
in Tactics Drills. (Clear Tactics
Drills maps for rewards like Hero
Feathers and Orbs.)

Learn about attack effectiveness
in the Effective Attacks map in
Tactics Drills.

Level up your allies in the Training
Tower. You can earn Badges and
Great Badges as well.

Raise an ally's level under Allies,
Ally Growth, and then Level Up.

Grant a stat boost to the ally you
choose to support.

Set Heroes as partners to grant
them a stat boost when they are
near each other on the battlefield.
Clear Book I, Chapter 2-5 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.
Have an Ally Learn a Skill

Spend an ally's Skill Points (SP)
to allow them to learn new skills.

Earn weekly rewards by achieving
victory in the Arena.

Raise an ally's level by deploying
them to Special Training maps.
Clear Book I, Chapter 5-5 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Gain Ike: Vanguard Legend as an
ally when you clear Xenologue 3.
Clear a Hero Battle on Normal

Gain featured Heroes as allies by
clearing their Hero Battles.
Clear Book II, Chapter 1-5 on Normal

Gain Fjorm: Princess of Ice as an
ally when you clear this map.
Clear Book I, Chapter 10-5 on Normal

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Raise an ally's level under Allies,
Ally Growth, and then Level Up.
Clear Book III, Chapter 1-5 on Normal

Earn Eir: Merciful Death as your
ally by clearing this story map.

Raise the ★ rating of your allies
by using Unlock Potential.
Clear Awakening Ancient Power on Normal

You can create new Sacred Seals
after clearing the Awakening
Ancient Power Intermission map
on Normal.

Sacred Seals can be equipped
via the Equip Seals menu.

Enhance Sacred Seals in the
Sacred Seal Forge to increase
their effect.
Clear Book I, Chapter 5-5 on Hard

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.
Clear Book I, Chapter 1-1 on Lunatic

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Raise an ally's level under Allies,
Ally Growth, and then Level Up.

Combine an ally with another ally
with the same name and epithet.
Have a Hero Inherit a Skill

Customize your Heroes by giving
them skills from other Heroes.

For starters, try granting Barst's
Reposition to one of your Heroes.
Clear the Rite of Blades on Normal

You can use the Weapon Refinery
after clearing the Rite of Blades
Intermission map on Normal.

Improve a weapon by working on
it in the Weapon Refinery.

Win battles in the Arena to earn
weekly rewards.
Clear All Basics Maps in Tactics Drills

Learn battlefield basics by
clearing all the Basics maps
in Tactics Drills.
Clear a Grand Hero Battle on Hard

Gain Grand Heroes as your allies
by clearing Grand Hero Battles.

Allies with blessings are stronger
in certain situations, like when
deployed with Legendary Heroes.
First, try conferring a blessing
onto Reinhardt.

Create a team of four Heroes who
are either blessed with Earth or
are Earth-type Legendary Heroes
in Edit Teams in the Allies menu.

You can enter the Garden of Earth
with Earth-type Legendary Heroes
and Earth-blessed Heroes.
Clear a Grand Hero Battle on Lunatic

Gain Grand Heroes as your allies
by clearing Grand Hero Battles.

You can earn Dragonflowers by
clearing Heroic Ordeals.

Use Dragonflowers to increase
the stats of your allies.

You can earn blessings and Heroic
Grails from Aether Raids.

Create a team of four Heroes who
are either blessed with Light or
are Light-type Mythic Heroes via
the Form Raiding Party menu in
Aether Raids.

Earn various rewards, including
Hero Feathers and blessings, via
victory in Allegiance Battles.

Earn high scores to climb
the tier ladder, rung by rung,
to Tier 10.
Clear Book I, Chapter 13-5 on Hard

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Reach Tier 10 by increasing your
Lift via victory in Aether Raids.
Clear a Grand Hero Battle on Infernal

Gain Grand Heroes as your allies
by clearing Grand Hero Battles.
Chain Seven Wins in Arena Assault

Earn rewards like Refining Stones,
Sacred Coins, and Hero Feathers
by clearing Arena Assault maps.

Earn special Sacred Seals by
clearing Squad Assault.
Clear Book I, Chapter 13-5 on Lunatic

Earn Orbs whenever you clear
a story map for the first time.

Earn special Sacred Seals by
clearing Squad Assault maps.
Clear a Grand Hero Battle on Abyssal

Earn special accessories by
clearing Grand Hero Battles
on Abyssal difficulty.

Earn high scores to climb
the tier ladder, rung by rung,
to Tier 15.

Reach Tier 15 by increasing your
Lift via victory in Aether Raids.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.

With Anna on your team, clear the Grand Hero
Battle against Panne: Proud Taguel.

With Panne: Proud Taguel on your team, clear
the Grand Hero Battle against Panne: Proud
Taguel on Lunatic or harder.

Use Anna to defeat a level 40 or higher
Panne: Proud Taguel.

Use Panne: Proud Taguel to defeat a level 40
or higher Panne: Proud Taguel.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Panne:
Proud Taguel on Lunatic or higher using an
all-armored team.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.

Clear Paralogue 38: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 38: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.) All four allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 38: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a axe ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.) All four allies must survive.

A shining example of the mage knights of
Friege's army. Leads his partners with nimble,
precise steps. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Thracia 776.

The heir to Mjölnir, she carries the blood of
Friege's royal family. Dances with the power
of rolling thunder. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Thracia 776.

A royal of the Rigelian Empire. Dancing holds
no particular interest for him, but he can't say
no to Rinea's pleading smile. Appears in Fire
Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

Berkut's betrothed. Typically on the reserved
side, she loves to dance. She moves to the beat
of any music playing in earshot. Appears in Fire
Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

A militia member from the Crimean countryside.
Urges her allies onward with the dance steps
she's been practicing. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Path of Radiance.

Grants Atk+3. If unit initiates combat, grants
Special cooldown charge +1 to unit and inflicts
Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack.
(Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

Effective against dragon foes. Grants Def+3.
Grants Atk/Spd+3 to sword, lance, axe, bow,
dagger, or beast allies within 2 spaces during
combat.

Effective against flying foes. Grants Spd+3.
Neutralizes bow, dagger, magic, or staff foe's
bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.)
during combat.

If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+7 and
Def+10 during combat and foe cannot
make a follow-up attack.

Grants Def/Res+3 to sword, lance, axe, bow,
dagger, or beast allies within 2 spaces during
combat, and if foe initiates combat against
those allies, grants Special cooldown charge +1
per attack to those allies. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

Reduces damage from foe's first attack by
40%. If foe initiates combat, foe can make a
follow-up attack before unit can counterattack.

At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd,
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

If Sing or Dance is used, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to target.

Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+4
to allies within 2 spaces during combat against
sword, lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast foes.

Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

Grants Def/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat against bow, dagger, magic,
or staff foes.

Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks
twice.

Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+2 and
Def+3 to target.

If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk+3 and
Def+4 to target.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk+5 to unit and adjacent allies for
1 turn.

In ancient times, Elibe was consumed
by war between human and dragon.
After 1,000 years of relative peace
following humankind's victory, the
nation of Bern marched to invade
nearby lands. Upon hearing, Roy, son
of the Marquess of Pherae, rushed
home, finding seditious soldiers who
had sided with Bern...
